Articles.Content:
Question for the old breed

Do any of you remember that soyuz and lander mod for version 0.13.x where the lander was a small squarish thingy?
I was trying to find it but it seems the page it was on no longer exists, but I found some youtube videos from which I took a couple of bad screenshots for reference.

Anyway. Did you ever tried to pull that off in more recent versions? Because I think I'm gonna try it next time
